title: Found in Ambiguity
description: Tabley-award winning drama that some are calling the greatest movie of all time. A sleeper hit.
quote: Veracity? You can’t grasp the veracity!
altHero: Barry Buns wearing a crown in a colosseum
alt1: people riding horses in the distance past the Great Pyramids
alt2: Renée du Bedat dressed as Shakespeare running across the foyer of a mansion
alt3: Barry, Renée, and Candle Fox looking up in the shadow of a UFO
alt4: Barry and his hot dog cart going flying with a huge explosion behind
